content:
San Mateo Meeting Participants

The following people participated in the Informal Meeting of the Working Group on Distributed Authoring on World Wide Web, held July 10, 1996, at the offices of AOL Productions, San Mateo, California.

Bruce Brown America Online, Santa Barbara Bruce@sb.aol.com
Ed Burns Silicon Graphics edburns@sgi.com
Keith Dawson Atria Software dawson@atria.com
Lee Farrell Canon Information Systems lfarrell@cisoc.canon.com
Ron Fein Microsoft ronfe@microsoft.com
Dennis E. Hamilton Xerox PARC hamilton@parc.xerox.com
Dave Long America Online, Santa Barbara dave@sb.aol.com
Larry Masinter Xerox PARC masinter@parc.xerox.com
Henrik Frystyk Nielsen World Wide Web Consortium frystyk@w3.org
Kenji Ota NTT Software Laboratories ota@nttlabs.com
Christopher Seiwald P3 Software seiwald@p3.com
Andrew Schulert Microsoft andyschu@microsoft.com
Jim Whitehead Univ. of California, Irvine ejw@ics.uci.edu
Tom Wills Xerox XSoft twills@xsoft.xerox.com

University of California, Irvine
Jim Whitehead <ejw@ics.uci.edu>

247 ICS2 #3425
